forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 19C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
